content.body: PerformPromiseAll's abstract closure defines `_index_`, which is also defined outside the closure, which I think was discouraged at some point. Doesn't appear in Editorial-Conventions though. (Abstract closures don't appear at all in Editorial-Conventions.)
content.formatted_body: PerformPromiseAll's abstract closure defines _index_, which is also defined outside the closure, which I think was discouraged at some point. Doesn't appear in Editorial-Conventions though. (Abstract closures don't appear at all in Editorial-Conventions.)

content.body: yeah, we generally try to avoid shadowing
in this case, we should probably just inline it, since there's only 1 usage site
